summary: This mods adds the ancient vampire race to your skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]              [/size][size=6]         [/size][u][size=6]ANCIENT VAMPIRE RACE[/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=5]VERY[/size][/color][color=#ff00ff]RECOMENDED[/color][color=#980000]: [/color][color=#f1c232]ENHANCED[/color][color=#ffff00]CHARACTER[/color][color=#bf9000]EDIT[/color] [size=3]:http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/? by ECE team [/size]


[color=#980000]-WHAT DO THIS MOD?[/color]
[/u]
[size=4]This mod adds 11  new ancient vampire races (looks more monsterous than the vanilla ones) , one for each race and the ''elder'' vampire race.[/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=5]-[/size][/color][color=#ff7700][size=4]Instalation[/size][/color][color=#ff0000]:

[/color][size=4]drag the esp into your data folder, then do a bashed patch (recomended).

[/size](EACH RACE HAS A VAMPIRE VERSION)

[color=#ff0000][size=5]-[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/color]:


This mod is compatible with ALL vampire mods ( better vampires , royal bloodline ,better fangs , dynamic vampire stages...).

[color=#e69138][size=4][u]-Requeriments:[/u][/size][/color]

DAWNGUARD and SKYRIM.

Permissions: if you want to edit this mod , ask me first.

DONT UPLOAD THIS FILE TO STEAM WITHOUT MY PERMISSION.

If you find a bug , post it in comments and i will try to correct it.

[color=#bf9000][size=4]-THANKS TO:[/size][/color]

Me, to create the mod 
-Bethesda to bring us Skyrim
-CreationKit.

CHANGELOG:

-1.1 FIXED CRASH FOR SOME RACES. (NOW ALL WORKS FINE)
author: Evildark
